channel.title: Runserver error with itemhandler (testscape)
channel.description:
the error: starting testscape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at itemhandler.loaditem<itemhandler.java:311> at itemhandler.<init><itemhandler.java:39> at server.main<server.java:27>
if people login including me we get black screen.... can someone tell me what to do?[br][size=1]Posted at: August 24, 2006, 08:15:13 AM[/size][hr]fixed it i had space in stead of tab:P
